response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $800,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the effort put into its creation. I am confident it holds great potential value for you as well. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for premium quality. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 750000}
